page.title: 06Work at Mote Farm.
page.content: I live on Moat Farm.It is owned by Mr. Haylock who lives near by. My dad works there. There are 12 men on the farm.We have got 1100 pigs and 114 cows. My dad and his mate feed them every day. On Sundays one man feeds them all. There is a workshop for reparing machinery.The farm has bought two new tractors.One is a Ford 8210 four wheel drive. We have a new sprayer which cost Â£25,000. We do not grow crops on this farm. I live with my family in a house on the farm.We rent it as Dad is on the farm. by Robert.
